alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Linn, north central Iowa and southern Benton Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Luzerne, or 10 miles northwest of Marengo, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Dime size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Hiawatha, Robins, Belle Plaine, Center Point, Fairfax, Atkins, Palo, Shellsburg, Newhall, Blairstown, Van Horne, Keystone, Norway, Luzerne, Toddville, Pleasant Creek State Recreation Area, Hannen Lake Park, Watkins, and Koszta. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 19 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
